column2: Lethargic and largely stationary in cage, eyes bulging. Enlarged abdomen.
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
H&L were a fused mass, connected by some form of tisssue. There appeared to be some lumps of tissue fused to back of ribcage as well-- could have been tumor invastion
No cryovials frozen or cell line attempted.
Liver was marbled, very large, and very unhealthy looking.
